full_text: Big turn-out if Film workers at protest outside Irish Film Board this morning - demanding an end to abuse of workers rights in the industry @rtenews @NewstalkFM @98FM  @IrishTimesNews @sundaybusiness https://t.co/O1siDe4Y5M
